content:
I'm glad to hear that you're taking steps to ensure a good fit with Athleta's leggings! Sizing can be a challenge, especially with online purchases, but with a little extra effort, you can increase your chances of getting it right.

And yay for scoring a great deal on those ASOS sandals! $40 is a fantastic price for a pair of sandals that were perfect for a wedding. It's always exciting to find a great deal online, and it sounds like you're getting more comfortable with online shopping.

ASOS is a great online retailer, and they often have a wide selection of styles and sizes. Did you know that they also offer a "Fit Assistant" tool on their website? It's a great resource that can help you find the perfect fit based on your measurements and preferences.

Keep up the good work with your online shopping, and I hope you find the perfect pair of Athleta leggings with pockets! If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask.
